AUROC=0.7048646609450154	AUPRC=0.6466788186215727	Accuracy=0.6457528957528957	MCC=0.27307007958252494	Recall=0.403470715835141	Precision=0.6690647482014388	f1_score=0.503382949932341

######NOTE#######
#According to help_documentation of sklearn.metrics.classification_report:in binary classification, recall of the positive class is also known as sensitivity; recall of the negative class is specificity#

              precision    recall  f1-score   support

     control       0.64      0.84      0.72       575
        case       0.67      0.40      0.50       461

   micro avg       0.65      0.65      0.65      1036
   macro avg       0.65      0.62      0.61      1036
weighted avg       0.65      0.65      0.63      1036
